summary: The module implements automated tests for the VQGAN text‑to‑image example, setting up model and discriminator configurations, exercising training steps, and validating checkpoint persistence and exponential moving average (EMA) functionality.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the VQGAN text‑to‑image pipeline within the Diffusers library, facilitating stable releases and confidence for developers integrating the model into applications.
